issue.title: [R] Turn linter off on curly braces on new line
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-14533](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-14533). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Styler keeps introducing a change where a curly bracket is moved on to a new line, which subsequently triggers the linter.  Given that a curly bracket on its own line is within tidyverse style guidelines (see discussion here: <https://github.com/r-lib/styler/issues/438)> we should turn that linter check off.
